Entries.Introduction: Hey, it's Mr. @, the new farmer! I'm {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}, owner of the local general store.^Hey, it's Ms. @, the new farmer! I'm {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}, owner of the local general store.#$b#If you're looking for seeds, my shop is the place to go. I'll also buy produce from you for a good price!#$e#A little agriculture could really inject new life into the local economy!
Entries.Mon4_inlaw_Abigail: Hi, @. How's {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AbigailName}} doing? The shop hasn't been the same without her...
Entries.Thu8: #$1 pierre2#Does {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AbigailName}} look anything like me? Don't tell my wife, but sometimes I wonder if I'm really the {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Father:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreGender}}}}.$k$s#$e#Don't tell my wife, but I hate to cook dinner.
Entries.winter_Wed: #$1 pierreDin#I'm going to surprise {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/CarolineName}} tonight with dinner and a bottle of Stardew Red. Don't tell anyone!$k#$e#Finally, a day of relaxation.
